documents.title: LTDS Appendix 8 - Interest in Connections
documents.description:
Our LTDS Appendix 8 dataset contains data on the number and nature of HV connection enquiries received for a particular area. This may help users when assessing the feasibility of making a new or additional connection. The enquires were received in the 12-month period preceding submission.

If you are unsure of any of the column meanings, please hover over the column heading for a description.

Related Feature Pages

Long-Term Development Statement (LTDS) - Our LTDS provides essential network and asset information required to carry out studies of the NPg network to access potential connection points.

Network Availability Heat Maps - Our Heat Maps provide a high level overview of network availability at Primary, Bulk Supply and Grid Supply Point level using a traffic light system.

Connections Developers - Our Connections developers page is the best place for anyone interested in developing a connection to our network to start, either for a demand or generation connection.

Glossary of Terms

Our Glossary dataset provides definitions for various terms and acronyms found throughout our data. If the term you are searching for isn't in our list, please let us know via our Open Data team and we will get it added!

Data Governance

If you wish to view the data triage document for any dataset, they can be found in our Data Triage Assessment dataset.

This dataset DOES require a login to view

Any data caveats for the dataset are listed below

- None
